#summary Bridging axioms between SIO and RO

= Introduction =

The Semanticscience Integrated Ontology ([http://code.google.com/p/semanticscience/wiki/SIO SIO]) provides a simple, integrated ontology of types and relations for rich description of objects, processes and their attributes.

= Details =

We maintain a set of equivalence axioms connecting SIO and RO object proeprties here:

http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/ro/bridge/sio-ro-bridge.owl
